contentencoded:
Every so often we open up the mailbox (by which, of course, we mean we refresh our email and Facebook messages) and share a few of the notes we have received from listeners responding to recent episodes of the show.


This week, there are spooky coincidences, conspiracy theories, and the subject that has elicited the most listener comments ever, punctuation.

title: Coincidences, Conspiracies, and Other Listener Feedback
